name: admin.apps.uninstall
desc: Uninstall an app from one or many workspaces, or an entire enterprise organization.

app_id.desc: The ID of the app to uninstall.

enterprise_id.desc: The enterprise to completely uninstall the application from (across all workspaces). With an org-level token, this or `team_ids` is required.

team_ids.desc: IDs of the teams to uninstall from (max 100). With an org-level token, this or `enterprise_id` is required.

errors.can_not_uninstall: This application can not be uninstalled via the API.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
errors.must_revoke_access: Organization-deployed apps cannot be uninstalled from specific workspaces using this API.
errors.permission_denied: You do not have permission to uninstall applications from the reqeusted org or workspaces.
errors.teams_not_found: One or more of the provided `team_ids` were not found.
errors.too_many_teams: Too many IDs are present in `team_ids`.
errors.restricted_action: the user is not authorized to perform this action
